comments:
Note that this can be reproduced in a pure WTP environment (no adopter code present)

To recreate,

1) Create an ejb project with a single CMP ejb.
2) Shut down and re-start eclipse.
3) In the common navigator, expand the node representing the CMP.

Some of the children of the CMP node are missing, and the following exception is written to the console:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

Added to the 1.0.2 hot list. Setting priority to P2.
This is fixed for the 03/16/06 WTP 1.0.2 build and the 1.5 head stream.
